Bande ÃƒÂ  Part is Nouvelle Vague&#039;s second album, released in 2006. Like their eponymous first album, it is a collection of Bossa Nova cover versions of 1980s New Wave tracks. The French / UK edition has 14 tracks, with an 18-track limited edition. The slightly different U.S. edition, on the Luaka Bop label, had 14 tracks, with a 17-track limited edition.
